entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 07:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
